LanguageData.MLRP_AntiBronyHasPlushieExplanation: A pawn with the anti brony trait has a pony plushie equipped, which will cause a mood penalty until it is dropped. It might be worth assigning anti bronies to a separate outfit in order to prevent this.
LanguageData.MLRP_AntiBronyHasHarmonyChipExplanation: You have installed a harmony chip in a pawn with the anti brony trait. This will cause a -10 penalty to their mood until it is removed.
LanguageData.MLRP_CEDetectedWarning: IMPORTANT: I don't use CE, so patches for it are untested; please alert me ASAP if you encounter any problems!
